Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
First testing blog.
<!--more -->

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
Post.raw:

Post.title: Understand Blockchain 01
Post._content: (blockchain) ## ### * Transaction * Block * Chain , ![](14834176626345.jpg) ![](14834178266616.jpg) Blockchain 2.0 1. smart contract 2. DAPP: 3. > ### | | | | ---- | -------------------- | | PoW | (Proof of Work) | |PoS|(Proof of Stake) |DPoS|(Delegate Proof of Stake) |PBFT|(Practical Byzantine Fault Tolerance) |P2P|(Peer to Peer) |DAPP|(Decentralized Application) |KYC|(Know Your Customer) |RSA|RSA(RSA Algorithm) |ECC|(Elliptic Curve Cryptography) |BaaS|(Blockchain as a Service)| ### ,, , RSAECC 2-3 ![](14834174393360.jpg) ### PublicConsortiumPrivate ![](14834271525238.jpg) ### **** **** ## ### 7 side chainshadow chain 1-2 VISA 2000 tps 56,000 tps 85,000 tps 80,000 tps ### ### openssl heart bleeding 2016 6 17 DAO 6000 ### hash NoSql levelDBRocksDB \/ BlockDB ### ### , , ,, ,, , ### ## With smart contracts, for the first time, you can build business process automation software that cuts across different stakeholders, and can be relied on by all. Blockchain technology can get everyone looking at the same core data set. * * * airbnb * DAO * ![](/14839471054639.png) ![](/14845303553536.jpg) ### Skuchain Payments in a supply chain can be triggered by a certain, predefined action, occurring at any point in time. In general this works as follows: two parties agree to trade goods, and the selling party receives via his wallet a confirmation that he will be paid at a certain point if time. This guarantee is conditional, based on predefined criteria. The container with the goods contains a QR code, this is linked to a smart contract. When the goods arrive at the agreed point, and the pre-defined criteria are met, the smart contract is executed. This triggers the transfer of ownership to the buyer and payment to the supplier is executed automatically. The great advantage is that when the structure is set up, the costs for a transaction are minimal. They are comparable to physical mail (for example 1 per letter) versus e-mail (a negligible cost per item). , , **** , , ,: ,; ,, ,,, , **** ,, , ,, , ,, **1:** ,, ,, , ,, ,, ,,, ,, **2:** , , , , ,,, ### Lazooz OpenBazaar p2p ### ![](14835824591159.jpg) ## http://book.8btc.com/books/1/digital_giant_chain/_book/ http://8btc.com/doc-view-182.html

Blockchain technology can get everyone looking at the same core data set. * * * airbnb * DAO * ![](/14839471054639.png) ![](/14845303553536.jpg) ### Skuchain Payments in a supply chain can be triggered by a certain, predefined action, occurring at any point in time. In general this works as follows: two parties agree to trade goods, and the selling party receives via his wallet a confirmation that he will be paid at a certain point if time. This guarantee is conditional, based on predefined criteria. The container with the goods contains a QR code, this is linked to a smart contract. When the goods arrive at the agreed point, and the pre-defined criteria are met, the smart contract is executed. This triggers the transfer of ownership to the buyer and payment to the supplier is executed automatically. The great advantage is that when the structure is set up, the costs for a transaction are minimal. They are comparable to physical mail (for example 1 per letter) versus e-mail (a negligible cost per item). , , **** , , ,: ,; ,, ,,, , **** ,, , ,, , ,, **1:** ,, ,, , ,, ,, ,,, ,, **2:** , , , , ,,, ### Lazooz OpenBazaar p2p ### ![](14835824591159.jpg) ## http://book.8btc.com/books/1/digital_giant_chain/_book/ http://8btc.com/doc-view-182.html
Post.content:
(blockchain)

  • Transaction
  • Block
  • Chain


,

Blockchain 2.0

  1. smart contract
  2. DAPP:
PoW (Proof of Work)
PoS (Proof of Stake)
DPoS (Delegate Proof of Stake)
PBFT (Practical Byzantine Fault Tolerance)
P2P (Peer to Peer)
DAPP (Decentralized Application)
KYC (Know Your Customer)
RSA RSA(RSA Algorithm)
ECC (Elliptic Curve Cryptography)
BaaS (Blockchain as a Service)

,, , RSAECC 2-3

PublicConsortiumPrivate









7

side chainshadow chain 1-2


VISA 2000 tps 56,000 tps 85,000 tps 80,000 tps












openssl heart bleeding



2016 6 17 DAO 6000


hash
NoSql
levelDBRocksDB \/
BlockDB

###



,
,
,, ,, ,





With smart contracts, for the first time, you can build business process automation software that cuts across different stakeholders, and can be relied on by all. Blockchain technology can get everyone looking at the same core data set.

  • airbnb
  • DAO





Skuchain

Payments in a supply chain can be triggered by a certain, predefined action, occurring at any point in time.
In general this works as follows: two parties agree to trade goods, and the selling party receives via his wallet a confirmation that he will be paid at a certain point if time. This guarantee is conditional, based on predefined criteria. The container with the goods contains a QR code, this is linked to a smart contract. When the goods arrive at the agreed point, and the pre-defined criteria are met, the smart contract is executed.
This triggers the transfer of ownership to the buyer and payment to the supplier is executed automatically. The great advantage is that when the structure is set up, the costs for a transaction are minimal. They are comparable to physical mail (for example 1 per letter) versus e-mail (a negligible cost per item).

, ,

This guarantee is conditional, based on predefined criteria. The container with the goods contains a QR code, this is linked to a smart contract. When the goods arrive at the agreed point, and the pre-defined criteria are met, the smart contract is executed.
This triggers the transfer of ownership to the buyer and payment to the supplier is executed automatically. The great advantage is that when the structure is set up, the costs for a transaction are minimal. They are comparable to physical mail (for example 1 per letter) versus e-mail (a negligible cost per item).

Post.title: Hexo Theme Icarus Settings
Post._content:
Hexo Icarus ## HEXOICARUSHEXO [MoRan_Sky](http://moransky.xyz/2017/01/13/HEXO%20-%20Icarus%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE/),[Lemon](http://lemon23.me/2016/10/21/Hexo%E7%9A%84%E8%BF%87%E5%9D%91%E8%AE%B0/) wikiFQAhttps://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus/wiki ## ICARUS #### ICARUS - HEXO - #### ICARUS ICARUS[](https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus)GITHEXO, ```zsh $ git clone https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus.git themes/icarus ``` `theme: ` `theme: icarus` hexo s https://localhost:4000 #### LOGO LOGOLOGO LOGO.pngLOGOlogo.pngcss/images/ #### _configprofileprofile ```yml _config.yml profile: enabled: true # avatar: css/images/avatar.png # gravatar: # author: PPOffice # author_title: Web Developer & Designer # location: Harbin, China # follow: https://github.com/ppoffice/ # ``` `FOLLOW``` ```yml follow: mailto:wulala@123.com #languages/zh_CN.ymlfollow ``` #### ICARUS `_source`HEXOsource #### ICARUS`source/css/_highlight` `_config`highlight [](http://www.tuicool.com/articles/aamiimI) #### ICARUS3insightbaiduswiftype insight`_config.yml` ```yml search: insight: false ``` ```yml search: insight: true ``` ```zsh npm install hexo-generator-json-content --save ``` #### insight`layout/search/index.ejs`: ```html
``` ```html
``` #### ID[](https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus/wiki/Comment) [](http://duoshuo.com/create-site/).duoshuo.comshortname ICARUS_configcomment ```yml comment: disqus: #disqus shortname, if have duoshuo: #shortname, if have youyan: #shortname, if have ``` DisqusDisqusCreate a new forum forum integrateHexointegrateforumshortnameicarus`_config`integrate #### ICARUSDIV `source/css/_variables.styl`43 `main-column = 7` `main-column = 10 //910` #### bdsharejiathisGithubbsharedsshareGithub Page`_config`share: `share: addtoany` #### ICARUS`_config`miscellaneous ```yml links: : ``` ```yml links: GitHub: http://github.com MCBBS: http://mcbbs.net ``` #### `layout/widget/links.ejs` ```ejs
  • <%= i %>
    • ``` ```ejs
  • <%= i %>
    • ``` #### fa fa-iconICARUSFontAwesomeclass[](http://www.yeahzan.com/fa/facss.html) `fa-: ` `_config` ```yml social_links: github: #Github envelope: # user: # reorder: # sort-amount-asc: # ``` fa- #### title titletitle `layout/common/profile.ejs` ```ejs > ``` ```ejs > ``` configsocial_links ```yml : link: title: ``` #### HEXOsource/_postsICARUS `thumbnail` `banner` #### CSS`themes/icarus/source/css/_partial`class

--- title: Hexo Theme Icarus Settings date: 2017-03-10 23:34:33 tags: hexo categories: Hexo comments: toc: thumbnail: banner: --- Hexo Icarus ## HEXOICARUSHEXO [MoRan_Sky](http://moransky.xyz/2017/01/13/HEXO%20-%20Icarus%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE/),[Lemon](http://lemon23.me/2016/10/21/Hexo%E7%9A%84%E8%BF%87%E5%9D%91%E8%AE%B0/) wikiFQAhttps://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus/wiki ## ICARUS #### ICARUS - HEXO - #### ICARUS ICARUS[](https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus)GITHEXO, ```zsh $ git clone https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus.git themes/icarus ``` `theme: ` `theme: icarus` hexo s https://localhost:4000 #### LOGO LOGOLOGO LOGO.pngLOGOlogo.pngcss/images/ #### _configprofileprofile ```yml _config.yml profile: enabled: true # avatar: css/images/avatar.png # gravatar: # author: PPOffice # author_title: Web Developer & Designer # location: Harbin, China # follow: https://github.com/ppoffice/ # ``` `FOLLOW``` ```yml follow: mailto:wulala@123.com #languages/zh_CN.ymlfollow ``` #### ICARUS `_source`HEXOsource #### ICARUS`source/css/_highlight` `_config`highlight [](http://www.tuicool.com/articles/aamiimI) #### ICARUS3insightbaiduswiftype insight`_config.yml` ```yml search: insight: false ``` ```yml search: insight: true ``` ```zsh npm install hexo-generator-json-content --save ``` #### insight`layout/search/index.ejs`: ```html
``` ```html
``` #### ID[](https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus/wiki/Comment) [](http://duoshuo.com/create-site/).duoshuo.comshortname ICARUS_configcomment ```yml comment: disqus: #disqus shortname, if have duoshuo: #shortname, if have youyan: #shortname, if have ``` DisqusDisqusCreate a new forum forum integrateHexointegrateforumshortnameicarus`_config`integrate #### ICARUSDIV `source/css/_variables.styl`43 `main-column = 7` `main-column = 10 //910` #### bdsharejiathisGithubbsharedsshareGithub Page`_config`share: `share: addtoany` #### ICARUS`_config`miscellaneous ```yml links: : ``` ```yml links: GitHub: http://github.com MCBBS: http://mcbbs.net ``` #### `layout/widget/links.ejs` ```ejs
  • <%= i %>
    • ``` ```ejs
